name: siyuan-notes
title: Siyuan Notes
description: 思源笔记扩展，支持搜索、创建笔记和每日记录。
author: carpediem

commands.name: search-notes
commands.title: Search Notes
commands.description: 快速搜索思源笔记文档和块内容

commands.name: create-note
commands.title: Create Note
commands.description: 在指定笔记本中创建新的思源笔记文档

commands.name: add-to-daily-note
commands.title: Add to Daily Note
commands.description: 快速添加内容到今天的每日笔记中

commands.name: recent-notes
commands.title: Recent Notes
commands.description: 查看和访问最近修改的思源笔记文档

commands.name: note-roaming
commands.title: Note Roaming
commands.description: 笔记漫游功能：支持随机漫游、标签主题漫游和年老笔记回顾

commands.name: find-assets
commands.title: Find Assets
commands.description: 快速查找和管理 SiYuan assets 文件夹中的附件文件

commands.name: quick-add-note
commands.title: Quick Add Note
commands.description: 快速添加剪贴板内容到最近编辑的思源笔记文档中

preferences.name: siyuanUrl
preferences.title: 思源笔记服务器地址
preferences.description: 思源笔记服务器地址 (e.g., http://127.0.0.1:6806)

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: 思源笔记 API token (如果启用了身份验证)

preferences.name: notebookId
preferences.title: 默认笔记本ID
preferences.description: 创建新笔记的默认笔记本ID

preferences.name: dailyNotePath
preferences.title: 每日笔记路径模板
preferences.description: 每日笔记路径模板，格式：笔记本名称/文档路径 (e.g., 收集箱/daily note/{{year}}/{{month}}/{{date}})
